cause.description:
Hey everyone, i changed the name of the cause because i feel that we can add more to it other than just circus and zoo animals.
http://www.pet-abuse.com/database/
http://www.endanimalcruelty.com/main.html
http://www.bigcatrescue.org/animal_abuse.htm
http://www.stopanimaltests.org/index.aspx
http://stoppuppymills.org/
1. It's Not Natural
2. Animals Were Here First
3. Put Yourselves In Their Skin
cause.mission: End The Entertainment Business Used With Animals
cause.name: Everyday Animal Abuse
